member.name: IMFSignedLibrary.GetProcedureAddress
member.summary: Gets the procedure address of the specified function in the signed library.
member.param: The entry point name in the DLL that specifies the function.
Receives the address of the entry point.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFSignedLibrary
member.summary: Provides a method that allows content protection systems to get the procedure address of a function in the signed library. This method provides the same functionality as GetProcAddress which is not available to Windows Store apps.
